header_text: You are meeting a new friend for lunch soon. You have recently been a bit messier when you eat, and you are worried they will judge you. When you begin to eat your food, you notice your new friend is looking at you strangely.

elements.Text: Was your new friend judging you for being a messy eater?

elements.name: You are meeting a new friend for lunch soon. You have recently been a bit messier when you eat, and you are worried they will judge you. When you begin to eat your food, you notice your new friend is looking at you strangely._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
